Ready to hack the system and crack the code to boost Klarâ€™s organic visibility in Sweden? ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸ As our SEO Hacker, you will be diving deep into the digital landscape, analyzing data and tweaking the algorithm to unlock more organic traffic to our Swedish site. You will be the one behind the scenes, executing the strategy set from our Director of Organic Nikolaj and finding exploits to make Klarâ€™s site rise to the top of search results. If you are passionate about analyzing websites, cracking content codes, and tuning our pages to perfection, this is your digital playground! ğŸš€ ğŸ–¥ï¸

Your main mission will be to hack the SEO system for Klarâ€™s Swedish site. From optimizing on-page content to performing technical fixes, you will work hands-on to improve performance and ensure we stay ahead of the competition. You will constantly evaluate, optimize, and test content â€” if you enjoy working with text and figuring out what makes the algorithm tick, you will thrive in this role. The digital world is constantly evolving, and as an SEO Specialist, you will uncover new ways to enhance Klarâ€™s organic presence and outsmart the competition with innovative strategies. ğŸ”âš¡

So if you are a SEO Specialist ready to crack the code and boost performance, we would love to hear from you!

  • Day-to-day SEO actions and innovation in collaboration with the Director of Organic
  • Data & Performance analysis in primarily Ahrefs, Accuranker and Screaming frog
  • Choosing the right tasks that drives business instead - like optimizing business critical keywords, expanding EEAT initiatives, improving user experience
  • Ad-hoc keyword research and content gaps
  • Competitor and market research
  • Create content briefs for long-format content
  • Hands-on content tasks; will be part of day-to-day
  • Technical SEO hygiene
  • Sustainable backlink strategy planning and implementation

When are you "Klar"?

At Klar, we're not just opening doors; we're opening opportunities. Join us today, and let's make windows and doors more exciting than ever before!


ğŸ“The office location:

Klar is a Scandinavian organization with offices in Denmark and Estonia. Our headquarters and factory are located in Estonia, Tartu - but you will be working with our vibrant team in our Copenhagen-based office located in NÃ¸rrebro - Schiller House.

Here you will join and get 16 cool, talented, and totally awesome colleagues - we look forward to meeting you!

Our Copenhagen-based office is well connected to several public transportation points (bus and s-train stations within 2 min walk) and has access to a large parking lot (if you are not a big fan of cycling ğŸš´ ).
